headline: PMI U.S. eliminates 48 office positions at Swedish Match
summary: PMI U.S., the U.S. business of Philip Morris International, is eliminating 48 positions at Swedish Match in Owensboro, with some positions to be relocated while the others will be discontinued. In a prepared statement, Sam Dashiell, press officer manger for PMI U.S., said on Wednesday, the company “announced changes to our U.S. geographical footprint, to position our smoke-free business for ...

headline: Philip Morris International to Host Webcast of 2025 Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year Results
summary: STAMFORD, CT, January 30, 2026--Regulatory News: Philip Morris International Inc. (PMI) (NYSE: PM) will host a live audio webcast on Friday, February 6, 2026, at 9:00 a.m. ET, to discuss its 2025 Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year financial results, which will be issued at approximately 7:00 a.m. ET the same day. The webcast can be accessed here.
